mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

mapper.select: select ID, ACCOUNT, card_id, EMAIL, `PASSWORD`, PASSWORD_SALT, PAY_PASSWORD, PAY_PASSOWRD_SALT, HEAD_IMG, `NAME`, NICK_NAME, occupation, SEX, BIRTHDAY, LOCATOIN, QQ, PHONE, LOGIN_TIME, LOGIN_CNT, UN_DISCUSS, UN_SHARE, REGIST_TIME, LAT, LNG, `STATUS`, ORDER_ID, CREATE_ACCOUNT, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_ACCOUNT, MODIFY_TIME, FORGET_FLAG, SHARE_CNT, TOTAL_ORDER_PRICE, TOTAL_ORDER_CNT, integral, AMOUNT, RECHARGE_AMOUNT, GIVE_AMOUNT, USER_TYPE, SHOP_ACCOUNT_NAME, SHOP_BANK_NAME, SHOP_BANK_ACCOUNT, SHOP_INVOICE_TITLE, RATING, PAY_PWD_ERROR_CNT, PAY_PWD_ERROR_TIME, USER_ROLE, CONSOLE_PWD, USE_PAY_PASSWORD, CITY, ROLE_STATUS from t_user where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, ACCOUNT, card_id, EMAIL, `PASSWORD`, PASSWORD_SALT, PAY_PASSWORD, PAY_PASSOWRD_SALT, HEAD_IMG, `NAME`, NICK_NAME, occupation, SEX, BIRTHDAY, LOCATOIN, QQ, PHONE, LOGIN_TIME, LOGIN_CNT, UN_DISCUSS, UN_SHARE, REGIST_TIME, LAT, LNG, `STATUS`, ORDER_ID, CREATE_ACCOUNT, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_ACCOUNT, MODIFY_TIME, FORGET_FLAG, SHARE_CNT, TOTAL_ORDER_PRICE, TOTAL_ORDER_CNT, integral, AMOUNT, RECHARGE_AMOUNT, GIVE_AMOUNT, USER_TYPE, SHOP_ACCOUNT_NAME, SHOP_BANK_NAME, SHOP_BANK_ACCOUNT, SHOP_INVOICE_TITLE, RATING, PAY_PWD_ERROR_CNT, PAY_PWD_ERROR_TIME, USER_ROLE, CONSOLE_PWD, USE_PAY_PASSWORD, CITY, ROLE_STATUS from t_user
